channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After GOP fights about antisemitism, JD Vance rejects ‘purity tests’ and says there’s ‘more important work to do than canceling each other’
item.description: “I didn’t bring a list of conservatives to denounce or to de-platform,” Vance said during the Turning Point convention’s closing speech.

item.title: Trump taps Republican governor to serve as special envoy to Greenland
item.description: President Donald Trump declared in a Truth Social post that he is tapping Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to serve as U.S. special envoy to Greenland.

item.title: US Catholic bishops president says deportations instilling 'fear' in 'widespread manner': 'Concerns us all'
item.description: Archbishop Paul Coakley criticized President Donald Trump's mass deportations for spreading fear and uncertainty in immigrant communities.

item.title: DHS responds after reports CISA chief allegedly failed polygraph for classified intel access
item.description: DHS disputes reports that acting CISA director allegedly failed polygraph test, as ongoing investigation leads to suspension of multiple officials.

item.title: Colorado governor accuses Trump of playing 'political games' after FEMA denies disaster requests
item.description: Colorado Gov. Jared Polis accused President Donald Trump of playing "political games" after FEMA denied disaster relief for wildfires and flooding.

item.title: America’s Risky Retreat in Biomedical Leadership
item.description: The CDC’s plan to end primate research will weaken our biomedical capabilities just as our global competitors are shoring up theirs.

item.title: Nicki Minaj calls Trump and Vance ‘role models’ for young men in surprise appearance at Turning Point USA event
item.description: “Both of them have a very uncanny ability to be someone that you relate to.”

item.title: The Right’s Simmering Tensions over Abortion
item.description: Donald Trump’s political advisers don’t want to talk about abortion, but pro-lifers need to speak up.

item.description: Faith is not an intruder in public life; it’s a part of our civic DNA.

item.description: The chaplain brings God to the fight, offering something bigger for the soldier to hold on to. It is something an atheist can't offer.
